Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Digger \Dig"ger\, n. One who, or that which, digs. [1913 Webster]
{Digger wasp} (Zo["o]l.), any one of the fossorial Hymenoptera. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Diggers \Dig"gers\, n. pl.; sing. {Digger}. (Ethnol.) A degraded tribe of California Indians; -- so called from their practice of digging roots for food. [1913 Webster]
digger n 1: a laborer who digs 2: a machine for excavating [syn: {power shovel}, {excavator}, {shovel}]
